Description: At North Park Apartments, residents appreciate the luxury of a polished and elegant community. Walk through the Eurostyle entrance way into our immaculately maintained premises. The lobby, corridors and elevators are graced with rich wood and detailed stonework. Step into our sparkling rooftop pool, or work out in our state-of-the-art fitness center overlooking the beautiful Maryland landscape! Live in one of the most vibrant suburbs of the Washington DC area... experience luxury at its best. Just steps away from luxurious shopping areas including, fine dining, entertainment, beautiful public parks, and only two blocks from the Friendship Heights Metro Station.

Description: Wisconsin Place Apartments, in the heart of Friendship Heights, is situated between Chevy Chase and Mazza Gallerie. Our community brings the best of Wisconsin Avenue right to your doorstep, with plenty of boutique shopping and award-winning dining and just steps from the metro. Our studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments feature an open kitchen layout with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, cherry plank flooring, walk-in closets, in-home washer/dryer and private balcony. Enjoy our fitness center, clubhouse, screening room and rooftop pool.

Description: At 4701 Willard Apartments in Chevy Chase, MD, it's city living in a neighborhood atmosphere. We are just a short walk from the Friendship Heights Metro and Whole Foods and only 10 minutes from the US Embassies. Our homes offer granite countertops, stainless steel energy-efficient appliances, beautiful flooring, oversized closets, enclosed glass sun rooms and spectacular views of the National Cathedral, Bethesda and more. You'll find everything you need with a 24-hour concierge. Enjoy the rooftop swimming pools and a tennis courts.

Description: The Lake Apartments and Townhouses are nestled in safe and well-groomed community near Connecticut Avenue in Chevy Chase. Located less than a mile from I-495 and 2 miles from the DC line, our apartments and townhouses are known for convenience and located in the sought-after Montgomery County School District. There is a grocery store, Starbucks, shopping, and Capital Crescent Trail within walking distance and free shuttle to the Bethesda Metro. Our three-level townhouses offer gleaming hardwood floors, spacious rooms, and personal backyards. Our apartments feature wall-to-wall carpeting, ample closet space, personal washer/dryer, and central A/C. Both of our communities are pet friendly!

Within walking distance you will find Safeway, Trader Joe's, and Giant Food, numerous dining options, and much more! Description:
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION. This 4 Bedroom with a large full finished walkout basement Brick Colonia is less than five minutes pleasant walk to Bethesda Metro Center, within a couple of hundred yards of Crescent Trail and less than 50 Yards from Bethesda-Chevy Chase High School with plenty of parking space. 
living room and wood burning fireplace. Formal Dining room, Kitchen, a good size den off the kitchen. hardwood floors throughout. Gas oven/range, refrigerator, Door in kitchen leads out to a screen porch and a large fenced backyard. Three bedrooms and a full bath are all located on the top floor of the house. Full finished walkout basement with a full bath and a gas fireplace.
You are minutes from restaurants, nightlife and grocery stores Barns & Noble and etc.... 
Four young professionals who would like to share this house will love this location and excellent for a home office. 
The rent is $4,500.00 plus one-month security deposit. Please email me your phone number at rugweb@aol.com to be contacted. Eden.

Description:
Four blocks from Friendship Heights Station, buses & Metro (RED)
Free local shuttle for grocery, commute. Rent: 1 Studio: $1400 (including gym in the building)
Utilities: ALL INCLUDED - Electricity, Gas, Kitchen Supplies.
Furnishing: FULL
with High End Mattress Bed, 1080p LED TV, walk-in-closet.
Deposit: 1 months' rent. 1 months advance
Notice: 1month (only on 1st)
Cleanliness: SUPER CLEAN
Separate Bath: Yes
distance to FRIEND SHIP HEIGHTS METRO train: 4 blocks
AC / heater: Yes/Yes (Included)
Washer/Dryer: In the building. $0.75 per load to wash/dry.
Elevator: YES
Total rooms in this apartment: 1
Cleanliness: Excellent
***MUST BUY RENTERS INSURANCE*****

Description: Located in the heart of Friendship Heights, steps from the Whole Foods and Metro Red Line. This large efficiency in the sought after Willoughby Condo is clean, bright and a great place to call Home! Checkout the web site at www.willoughby.org for more information. The $1375 per month rent includes all utilities (except for phone and cable), garage parking space, pool and gym access. The tenant is responsible for $200 move in fee, $60 deposit for building access key (will be returned after move out), $25 Rental application fee (great credit required).

Monthly Fees:
* Cat Rent: $30
* Dog Rent: $30
* Water, Trash Removal, Sewer: Included
One Time Fees:
* Application Fee: $15
* Cat Deposit: $300
* Dog Deposit: $300

Description:
In the heart of exciting Downtown Bethesda, The Fields puts you right in the middle of one of the DC area’s most sought-after communities. Surrounded by incredible shopping and overflowing with popular restaurants, Bethesda offers you everything you want close to home. ?Stroll to dozens of exceptional restaurants and stores
?Take in a blockbuster movie or art film at one of two nearby theaters
?Walk to the Bethesda Metro, just 8 to 12 minutes away
?Enjoy a live performance at the nearby Music Center of Strathmore
?Bike the Capital Crescent Trail
?Drive to downtown DC in just minutes
?Easily access I-495 and I-270 The Fields of Bethesda offers studio, one-bedroom with den, two-bedroom and three-bedroom apartment homes.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range

Description: Immaculate brick end-unit townhome w/2 car garage. Hardwood floors high ceilings gourmet kitchen w/breakfast area deck off kitchen fireplace. Stunning master bedroom with sumptuous master bath. Walkout LL family room. Across from Walter Reed NIH and Harris Teeter! Quiet community just minutes from downtown Bethesda. Pets considered-case by case basis.

Pet friendly & doorman bldg!

Only a couple of blocks to metro and Wisconsin Ave. Rooftop terrace & pool exercise rm 24 hr front desk laundry facilities on each floor.

Description: Available now! Beautiful & spacious updated 2 bedroom 2 full bath condo in downtown Bethesda. Includes one garage space. All utilities included in rent. Rooftop terrace and pool exercise rm.

Description: Updated Tudor colonial loaded w/ character in prestigious Kenwood! Recent granite & stainless kitchen and renovated baths! Sought after community locally famous for its cherry tree lined streets. Access to the popular Crescent Trail within the neighborhood - walk or bike to downtown Bethesda or all the way to Georgetown! Dark hardwood flooring adds to the elegance. Deck to enjoy private back yard.

Address: 5500 Friendship Blvd #N1702 Chevy Chase, MD 20815

Lease Terms: Available Now for a 12 Month Lease
Rent: $1,375/month
Unit Type: Condo Efficiency - Parking: Street, Garage Units Potentially Available

- Kitchen: Electric Cooktop and Oven, Disposal, Refrigerator and Freezer
- Full Bathrooms: One
- Floors: Hardwood Floors, Tile in Kitchen and Bath
- A/C & Heat: Included w/ S/W Turnover
- Big windows providing lots of natural light, an open floor plan, and good sized closets
Building & Location:
- Amenities: 24 hour front desk, a fabulous roof top deck and pool, large gym, saunas, a convenience store, and laundry rooms on every floor
- Shopping, Restaurants, and the Metro (Red Line) ALL within walking distance
- Laundry: W/D on Every Floor
- Secured Entry, Elevator
Terms & Conditions:

- Deposit Equal to the First Month's Rent
EJF Real Estate Services Inc.
1428 U Street NW, Second Floor
Washington, DC 20009
Main Line: 202.537.1801
No Pets Allowed

Description:
(240) 988-8008 - Great Commuter Friendly 4BR 3.5BA Located in Chevy Chase - Welcome home to your expansive Ranch style home located in Chevy Chase Maryland. 
Located close to Connecticut Avenue, you'll be able to easily go to downtown DC, downtown Bethesda or head north to the Beltway. Near Columbia County Club, you're also a reasonable walk into the restaurants, movie theaters, bars and shopping that Bethesda has to offer.
There's so much to say about this house, I'll leave you with some highlights but look at the pictures and then make an appointment to come see this place. There is a large, renovated kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths upstairs with another bonus room and bath in the basement. The screened in porch is a great place to enjoy an indoor/outdoor space. 3 fireplaces are super for making a warm fire. A great garage. And you're on almost a half an acre of land. 
Please email Noah Trager at Noah@StreamlineManagement.com to make an appointment to see your next home!
Lease terms:
*$40 application fee required
*1 months rent security deposit required
*Sorry, no smoking inside the property
*Min 12 month lease 
*Pets are considered on a case by case basis
*Tenant responsible for utilities (water, gas & electric)
*Tenant responsible for lawn maintenance and landscaping
To apply, please visit our online application at www.streamlinemanagement.com and go to the "Available Rentals" section, click "View Details" for the listed property, and then click orange "Apply Now" button. Please be sure to fill out all information correctly and provide requested documents. The $40 application fee must be paid in order for the application to be reviewed.
(RLNE3554558)

Description:
(301) 652-7077 - Large 1BR/1BA in Chevy Chase, Close to Bethesda, DC & 495 - RENT SPECIAL $500 OFF 2ND MONTH'S RENT
Newdale Mews is a garden style (not a high rise) apartments community in Chevy Chase. We are offering a 1BR/1BA with new w/w carpet, updated kitchen, bathroom re-build and more... 
Our garden apartments are 1/2 block off Connecticut Avenue in Chevy Chase - near Starbucks & Einstein Bagel - on serene Newdale Rd. Close by NIH with Ride On to Bethesda and Friendship Heights Metro. Free neighborhood shuttle to Metro stations. 
Free assigned parking.
We are also nearby 495 for easy access to VA and MD. 
Enjoy nearby Crescent Trail.. This is a wonderfully friendly community. One year leases only, pet restrictions apply. $350 annual pet fee. 
Call Landmark Realty during the week @ 301-652-7077 or Ana Magee @ 240-506-3465. $40 application fee per adult and $1000 security deposit. You can take a virtual tour and download an application at www.Bindeman.com. 
We are open M-F, 9-5, and weekends by appointment. Same day application review.
(RLNE2703872) Other Amenities - Other- free assigned parking. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description: Our townhomes and apartments are nestled in a safe and well-groomed community, less than a mile from I-495 and less than two miles from Washington, with a nearby supermarket, shopping and the Capital Crescent Trail, located in the sought-after Montgomery County, MD School District. Our three-level townhouses offer gleaming hardwood floors, spacious rooms, and personal backyards.

Description: The Chevy Chase Drive Apartments consists of 17 one and two bedroom apartments in a quiet residential setting in the sought after neighborhood of Chevy Chase. Convenient to the Metro and all of the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Bethesda, the property appeals to those seeking the benefits of modern urban living in an upscale suburban environment.
